casestudies.title: Launcing India's first clothes management system
casestudies.descrtiption1: Mainetti, the world's largest hanger makers from italy desired to enter the high volume & highly commoditized indian consumer hanger market
casestudies.descrtiption2: They reached out to The Suits to create a compelling brand story and a unique visual identity
